label.password_strength_hint: Use at least 8 characters, combine upper and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters.

error.other: There was a technical problem. Please try again.

otp.hint1: Enter the code from the authenticator app on your mobile device.
otp.hint2: Use a <0>backup code</0> instead or get instructions on how to <1>recover your account</1>.
otp.label: One-time password

backupCode.label: Backup code
backupCode.hint1: Enter a backup code in case you lost access to your mobile device.
backupCode.hint2: Get instructions on how to <0>recover your account</0>.

error.otp_timeout: Time out. Enter credentials and OTP within 5 minutes.

forgot_password_page.title: Forgot password
forgot_password_page.success_message: An email will be sent if the provided address is valid.

reset_password_page.title: Password reset
reset_password_page.success_message: Your password has been reset. Please log in using your new password.
reset_password_page.no_token_message: There is no active password reset link available. Please create a new request.

welcome_page.title: Welcome
welcome_page.explanation: To enable you to log in and access the world of injixo, enter your new password.
welcome_page.success_message: Welcome, you successfully set your password and can log in now.

profile_page.title: Profile
profile_page.update_successful: Your profile has been updated successfully.
profile_page.update_error: Your profile could not be saved.
profile_page.submit_success: Your profile has been updated successfully.

email_verification.pending: Your email address has not been verified. <0> Resend verification email. </0>
email_verification.verified: Your email address has been verified successfully. You now have access to the remaining features.
email_verification.failure: Your email address could not be verified. The link that you have requested does not exist.
email_verification.resent: We have just sent you an email to verify your email address.

validation.max: must not be longer than {{max}} characters.
validation.email: is not a valid email format.

notifications.blocked: Your browser does not allow injixo notifications. You can change this in your browser settings.
notifications.not_set: To receive injixo notifications in your browser, you need to allow them in your browser settings.
notifications.not_supported: Your current browser does not support notifications.
notifications.title: Notifications

change_password.submit_failed: The password could not be saved.
change_password.submit_success: Your password has been updated successfully.

enabled.hint2: To protect your account we strongly recommend keeping 2FA enabled. To register a new device simply re-enable 2FA.
enabled.help: Contact an injixo administrator in case of any problems or to switch to a new device.

disabled.hint: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to log in. Learn more in <0>Help Center</0>.

enable_2fa_page.backup_codes_confirmation: You need to confirm that you securely stored your backup codes.
enable_2fa_page.sudo_expired: Your session has expired. You can restart the activation process by reloading the page.
enable_2fa_page.enabling_failed: Something went wrong while activating 2FA. Please try again later.

step_1.header: 1. Install an authenticator app on your mobile device
step_1.description: Install one of the following authenticator apps on your mobile or tablet device:

step_2.header: 2. Add injixo to your authenticator app
step_2.description: In your anthenticator app, add a new account by

step_3.header: 3. Enter one-time password from your authenticator app
step_3.description: Enter the code generated by the authenticator app to register your device

step_4.description: If you lose access to your authenticator app, you can use one of the following one-time passwords to verify your identity. Treat them confidentially and store them in a secure place.
step_4.warning: You will not be able to access these passwords once you leave this screen.
step_4.checkbox: I securely stored my backup codes.

enforcement.message: Two-factor authentication has been made mandatory to use injixo. To proceed with your login, follow the steps below.
enforcement.hint: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to log in. Learn more in <0>Help Center</0>.

enable_2fa.success_message: Two-factor authentication has been enabled successfully

disable_2fa.success_message: Two-factor authentication has been deactivated successfully

hint.admin: Single sign-on is active for your account. The default login with email and password is no longer available.
hint.password: Your email and password is now managed in your identity provider. For any updates contact your administrator
hint.user: Single sign-on is active for your account. The default login with email and password is no longer available. If you need to update your stored data or request a new login, contact your administrator.
